div.div: Table S2. Climate data and meteorological station names.
div.p: Max Temperature, Min Temperature, Mean Temperature and coefficient of variation per sampling period corresponding period (November–February). Max Precipitation, Min Precipitation, Mean Precipitation and coefficient of variation per sampling period corresponding period (November–February). Meteorological stations names and coordinates. The data of each meteorological station are available at http://smn.cna.gob.mx.
